Translations.Text: DEUS advocates justice charity relatives. He forbids malus vice transgression. He enlightens vos ut vos take heed
(Vos fulfill tuus covenant DEUS when vos factus such covenant Vos non violate oaths juravit Deus) carry them vos factus DEUS guarantor vos! DEUS knows everything VOS PERFECIT

Non est knitter unravels eam strong knitting into piles flimsy yarn Hoc est tuus example vos abuse oaths take advantage de unus alias 1 group est magnus than alius DEUS sic puts vos test He surely show vos Feria Resurrection everything vos disputed
Habet DEUS willed He factus vos 1 congregation! He sends astray whoever chooses iit astray He guides whoever wishes guided Vos surely est asked de everything vos perfecit
Non abuse oaths vos lest vos slide back habet strong foothold tunc vos incur misery! Such est consequence de repelling ex path DEUS setting malus example vos incur terrible retribution
Non sell tuus oaths short DEUS! Quod DEUS possesses est far bene vos si vos unus knew
quod vos possess runs out quod DEUS possesses extremum forever Nos surely reward those qui steadfastly persevere nos recompense them their righteous works
Anyone works righteousness vir femina dum believing nos surely grant them happy vita in hoc saeculum nos surely pay them their foderator recompense Feria Judgment their righteous works
When vos read Quran vos seek refuge DEUS ex Satan the rejected
He non habet power over those believe trust their Dominus
His power limited those choose eum prout their magister those qui choose eum their deus
